Interface DevicesApi

  • All Superinterfaces:
    ApiClient.Api

    public interface DevicesApi
extends ApiClient.Api

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Interface and Description
      static class  DevicesApi.GetDevicesQueryParams
      A convenience class for generating query parameters for the getDevices method in a fluent style.

    • Method Detail

      • createDeviceEvents

        CreateDeviceEventsResponse createDeviceEvents(java.lang.String authorization,
                                              java.lang.String deviceId,
                                              DeviceEventsRequest deviceEventRequest)
        Create Device Events. Create events for a device. When a device is managed by a SmartApp then it is responsible for creating events to update the attributes of the device in the SmartThings platform. The token must be for a SmartApp and it must be the SmartApp that created the Device.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        deviceEventRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        CreateDeviceEventsResponse

      • deleteDevice

        DeleteDeviceCommandsResponse deleteDevice(java.lang.String authorization,
                                          java.lang.String deviceId)
        Delete a Device. Delete a device by device id. If the token is for a SmartApp that created the device then it implicitly has permission for this api.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        Returns:
        DeleteDeviceCommandsResponse

      • executeDeviceCommands

        CreateDeviceCommandsResponse executeDeviceCommands(java.lang.String authorization,
                                                   java.lang.String deviceId,
                                                   DeviceCommandsRequest executeCapabilityCommand)
        Execute commands on device. Execute commands on a device.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        executeCapabilityCommand - (required)
        Returns:
        CreateDeviceCommandsResponse

        deviceId - the device ID (required)

      • getDeviceComponentStatus

        ComponentStatus getDeviceComponentStatus(java.lang.String authorization,
                                         java.lang.String deviceId,
                                         java.lang.String componentId)
        Get a device component's status. Get the status of all attributes of a the component. The results may be filtered if the requester only has permission to view a subset of the component's capabilities. If the token is for a SmartApp that created the device then it implicitly has permission for this api.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        componentId - The name of the component. (required)
        Returns:
        ComponentStatus

      • getDeviceStatus

        DeviceStatus getDeviceStatus(java.lang.String authorization,
                             java.lang.String deviceId)
        Get the full status of a device. Get the current status of all of a device's component's attributes. The results may be filtered if the requester only has permission to view a subset of the device's components or capabilities. If the token is for a SmartApp that created the device then it implicitly has permission for this api.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        Returns:
        DeviceStatus

      • getDeviceStatusByCapability

        CapabilityStatus getDeviceStatusByCapability(java.lang.String authorization,
                                             java.lang.String deviceId,
                                             java.lang.String componentId,
                                             java.lang.String capabilityId)
        Get a capability's status. Get the current status of a device component's capability. If the token is for a SmartApp that created the device then it implicitly has permission for this api.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        componentId - The name of the component. (required)
        capabilityId - (required)
        Returns:
        CapabilityStatus

      • getDevices

        PagedDevices getDevices(java.lang.String authorization,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> capability,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> locationId,
                        java.util.List<java.lang.String> deviceId)
        List devices. Get a list of devices.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        capability - The device capabilities to filter the results by. The capabilities are treated as an \"and\" so all capabilities must be present. (optional)
        locationId - The device locations to filter the results by. (optional)
        deviceId - The device ids to filter the results by. (optional)
        Returns:
        PagedDevices

      • getDevices

        PagedDevices getDevices(java.lang.String authorization,
                        java.util.Map<java.lang.String,java.lang.Object> queryParams)
        List devices. Get a list of devices. Note, this is equivalent to the other getDevices method, but with the query parameters collected into a single Map parameter. This is convenient for services with optional query parameters, especially when used with the DevicesApi.GetDevicesQueryParams class that allows for building up this map in a fluent style.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        queryParams - Map of query parameters as name-value pairs

        The following elements may be specified in the query map:

        • capability - The device capabilities to filter the results by. The capabilities are treated as an \"and\" so all capabilities must be present. (optional)
        • locationId - The device locations to filter the results by. (optional)
        • deviceId - The device ids to filter the results by. (optional)
        Returns:
        PagedDevices

      • installDevice

        Device installDevice(java.lang.String authorization,
                     DeviceInstallRequest installationRequest)
        Install a Device. Install a device. This is only available for SmartApp managed devices. The SmartApp that creates the device is responsible for handling commands for the device and updating the status of the device by creating events.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        installationRequest - Installation Request (required)
        Returns:
        Device

      • updateDevice

        Device updateDevice(java.lang.String authorization,
                    java.lang.String deviceId,
                    UpdateDeviceRequest updateDeviceRequest)
        Update a device. Update the properties of a device. If the token is for a SmartApp that created the device then it implicitly has permission for this api.
        Parameters:
        authorization - OAuth token (required)
        deviceId - the device ID (required)
        updateDeviceRequest - (required)
        Returns:
        Device
